name: Winds of Harmony
description: During this Round, your character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
descriptionraw: During this Round, your character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less $[K309].
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, your character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.
